thread.title: Protesters who climb atop water tanks to face arrest
thread.title_full: Protesters who climb atop water tanks to face arrest

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Protesters who climb atop water tanks to face arrest
text:
Tribune News Service
Dehradun, October 18
Sanjay Gunjyal, IG (Garhwal), has directed police officials of the Garhwal region to make immediate arrest of protesters who climb atop water tanks or towers in support of their demands. Gunjiyal, while presiding over a review meeting with SSPs and SPs of seven districts of the Garhwal zone at his office here today, expressed concern over an increase in dacoity cases in Dehradun and Haridwar. He directed district police chiefs to solve pending dacoity cases soon. Gunjyal said the crime rate in Uttarkashi, Rudraprayag, Dehradun, and Haridwar districts had reached an alarming proportion. He directed officials to launch vehicle checking drives in their respective districts. He said additional force be deployed at busy markets and inter-crossings to avoid any untoward incident during the festival season. The IG directed the Haridwar SSP to identify sensitive and ultra-sensitive places in the pilgrim city in the wake of the upcoming Panchyat elections. He said teams should be formed to arrest wanted hardcore criminals to order to maintain law and order in the city. The IG asked officials to take swift action in online and land fraud cases. Taking cognisance of fire incidents during marriage functions, the IG asked the SSPs and the SPs to cancel arms licence of those who indulge in celebratory fire. SSP, Dehradun, Sadanand Datte, SSP, Haridwar, Senthil AK Raj, SP, Chamoli, SK Meena, SP, Pauri, Rajeev Swaroop, SP, Tehri, Barinderjeet Singh, SP, Uttarkashi, Anant Shankar Takwale and SP, Rudraprayag, PN Meena attended the meeting.
